mapper.insert: insert into wineListTest (wineKrName, wineEgName, typeOfWine, nation, region, grape, price, alcohol, sweetness, acidity, body, goodsImg, recipe, goodsInfo) values (#{wineKrName}, #{wineEgName}, #{typeOfWine}, #{nation}, #{region}, #{grape}, #{price}, #{alcohol}, #{sweetness}, #{acidity}, #{body}, #{goodsImg}, #{recipe}, #{goodsInfo})
